job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
     * Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
     * Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
     * Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer, NLP

* Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
     * Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
     * Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
     * Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes research into deep learning and natural language processing techniques to improve a dialog system. While it mentions improving quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of models, and creating products used by millions, the core focus on 'researching latest techniques and methods' and 'improving the dialog system' aligns more with the predictive modeling and algorithm development aspects of an ML Engineer, rather than the direct application development and fine-tuning of LLMs characteristic of a GenAI Engineer. The phrase 'dialog system' can be a component of GenAI, but the overall description leans towards foundational model improvement and application rather than the core generative aspects.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system' directly relates to creating, adapting, and improving machine learning models, specifically in the NLP domain.
job_tasks.phrase: Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases' indicates the need to understand business context and align technical work with product and policy goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models' points to the development and optimization of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters' suggests the development of applications or features that will be deployed to end-users, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy
improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture
